articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Cuban Embassy Officials Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Cuban Embassy Officials Held
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea arranged a friendly meeting with the Cuban embassy officials here at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 Present at the meeting on invitation were Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and his embassy officials.
					
					 Officials of the above-said department of the WPK Central Committee including Vice-Director Kim Thae Jong were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants of the meeting deepened friendship, talking to one another about the need to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the parties and peoples of the DPRK and Cuba in the new year, too.
					
					 Prior to the meeting its participants played sports and amusement games at the Meari Shooting Hall.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China, on Tuesday on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 98.
					 Written on the ribbon of the basket were letters reading "We wholeheartedly wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health".

articles.title: Leader's Field Guidance Spurring on Revolutionary Advance
articles.content:
Leader's Field Guidance Spurring on Revolutionary Advance
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- An unbroken chain of reports about the field guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il are now spreading in the DPRK aboil with a new revolutionary upsurge.
					Kim Jong Il visited Kangson and kindled the flame of a new revolutionary upsurge last December. And, from the beginning of the new year, braving bitter cold, he has been continuing his journey of field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army and various sectors of the national economy to touch off a great leaping forward on all fronts of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation by giving the fullest scope to the mental spirit of the people and the army.
					
					 Having made a never-ceasing forced march of field guidance last year    for the prosperity of the country, he visited the Guard Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Tank Division 105 of the KPA and congratulated its officers and men in the new year and showed them deepest benevolent affection.
					
					 Watching the valiant training of  the soldiers of an artillery  unit on his way of Songun leadership, he said the socialist motherland is invulnerable and the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be accomplished as it has the matchless great army that has become steel-strong in a nearly eight decade-long arduous struggle.   
					
					 Making a round of the just completed Wonsan Youth Power Station, he bestowed the highest praise on the officials and working people in Kangwon Province as forerunners of self-reliance who built the structure of the Songun era by their own efforts in the hard time when the country were undergoing a grim test. 
					
					 He had warmly supported the determination of the people of Kangwon Province to resolve the power problem by their own efforts and called at the construction site several times, encouraging the builders to heroic feats, and today he put them on the peak of glory. This warm love of the leader is stirring up the revolutionary zeal and militant morale of the entire army and people in the new year's march.
					
					 Nearly ten units have been reported to have been honored with his field guidance in the new year, which include the Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the Kum Song Tractor Plant seething with a new revolutionary upsurge amid the trust of the Workers' Party of Korea which set the working class up as the hero of the history of the great upsurge and the main combat unit in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.  
					
					Juche 98(2009) will hold a brilliant place in the history of the country as a year of a new revolutionary upsurge thanks to the energetic field guidance given by Kim Jong Il day and night from the first morning of the new year to adorn the centennial of Kim Il Sung's Korea in the year number of Juche with a great victory of people-centered socialism.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Call for Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Call for Confrontation with DPRK Blasted
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The puppet minister of Defense, the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and other warmongers of south Korea have recently not bothered to let loose outbursts calling for making full preparations for the third West Sea skirmish and punishing someone.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes:
					
					 Such outbursts can be let loose only by those who worked out a scenario of a war against fellow countrymen while crying out for supporting traitor Lee Myung Bak's anti-DPRK confrontational policy by force of arms.
					
					 It was none other than traitor Lee Myung Bak who brought the belligerency of the military bosses to such phase. 
					
					 It was disclosed that recently the traitor reproached those of the Ministry of Unification for mentioning economic cooperation when receiving a report on the performance of its work, shouting hoarse that one should not think that economic cooperation would help improve the south-north relations just as what happened in the past.
					
					 His assertion that economic cooperation would not help improve inter-Korean relations means, in essence, one should not have an idea of having even economic cooperation. Clear is what the traitor is going to do after completely checking economic cooperation and totally freezing the north-south relations, not content with pushing the north-south dialogue to a total stalemate through extreme confrontational policy.
					
					 Lee and the puppet military warmongers had better pay heed to the warning issued by the General Staff of the Korean People's Army that its military retaliatory step will be implemented by the limitless merciless striking power of the strong revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu and a resolute action which can be hardly countered by any up-to-date means in the world. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak should have a proper understanding of the north-south relations. He should drop such foolish way of thinking as regarding the north-south cooperation as a sort of undertaking to offer something to the north, given that he has been thrown into a tight corner by public criticism due to the bankruptcy of businesses and a great number of unemployed,  the aftereffect of the world financial crisis.
					
					 To be a politician, one should properly know who one's partner is. As Lee lacks this ability, he only does something unsuccessful and allows himself to be bellicose which gets him nowhere. 
					
					 The day when he has a fit of belligerency will be recorded in history as his doom's day.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Hit for Bringing Situation to Catastrophe
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Hit for Bringing Situation to Catastrophe
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea is challenging the DPRK, kicking off war hysteria from the outset of the new year. This is an undisguised negation of inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation and an open declaration of the all-out confrontation with the DPRK. Leading newspapers Tuesday observe this in signed commentaries.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The group of traitors has categorically opposed the inter-Korean declarations and has not uttered even a word about "the north-south joint declaration" nor has shown any idea of discarding the old attitude of confrontation with the DPRK since the beginning of the new year, either. This is a clear proof that it has only an ill-intention to stand in confrontation with the DPRK in utter disregard of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The group brought the inter-Korean relations of reconciliation and unity, which had developed in the idea of "By our nation itself," back to those of distrust and confrontation in the period before the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration. It cannot escape a stern judgment of the nation for the above-said crime only. 
					
					 It raised a hue and cry over the "emergency situation" to bedevil the inter-Korean relations, thus hurting even the supreme dignity of the DPRK and pushing the situation to a brink of war.  The group should be held fully accountable for this crime, too.
					
					 The warmongers of the puppet military dared put spurs to the preparations for "preemptive strike" and "punishment" of the DPRK under the motto of remaining true to the "idea of the ruler," and have undisguisedly perpetrated intrusions into its territorial waters in the West Sea of Korea and steadily rendered the situation tense through frantic arms buildup and exercises for a war of aggression against it. These are dangerous actions to ignite the said war at any cost in league with foreign forces.
					
					 The Lee group is now running the whole gamut of sleight of hand to evade its responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations into the worst crisis but this will get it nowhere. 
					
					 If the puppets persist in their moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, lending no ear to the solemn declaration of its revolutionary armed forces that they would mercilessly shatter the puppets' moves for confrontation with it, they will not be able to escape disgraceful destruction. 
					
					 Minju Joson urges the Lee group to stop the above-said moves, apologize for its wrongdoings before the nation and step down, though belatedly.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Legalize Military Expansion Overseas Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Legalize Military Expansion Overseas Flayed
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' moves to dispatch warships of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) to the waters off Somalia are aimed to expand the sphere of the MSDF's activities to the coastal waters of Africa while letting it operate in the Indian ocean and thus lay a military springboard from which to launch aggression overseas and gain experience in practice. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The legitimate dispatch of the MSDF's warships to the waters off Somalia which has been under hot debate in Japan since last year is becoming a reality. This is a new dangerous step for the Japanese militarists' military expansion overseas.
					
					 It is an invariable ambition and strategic aim of the Japanese militarist forces to realize the military expansion overseas. The said step is prompted by such aim.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking another sinister aim through their intention to dispatch the above-mentioned warships to the sea off Somalia under the pretext of "combating piracy."
					
					 Japan's present Constitution bans both the exercise of "right to collective self-defence" and the military operation overseas for being a war criminal state and a defeated nation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese chief executive asserted that the dispatch of the MSDF's warships to the sea off Somalia aimed at "combating piracy" is an issue quite different from the "right to collective self-defence".
					
					 If those warships clash with armed pirates in the sea off Somalia, they will have no option but to use force against them. In that case, this would be obviously a use of force overseas, a gross violation of the present Constitution.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the Japanese reactionaries are craftily working to convince the world that the use of force by those warships dispatched overseas for the above-said mission is something "unavoidable."
					
					 Japan is employing such artifice to create a favorable environment for military expansion overseas and legalize the SDF's military operation overseas.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to squarely watch the world and drop its poor trick to legalize its military expansion overseas.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Plans to Create Apache Unit
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Plans to Create Apache Unit
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are mulling creating an Apache unit.
					 A spokesman for the puppet Office for Defense Affairs on Jan. 15 announced that the office is now studying the proposal to purchase Apaches in an effort to create an Apache unit of two squadrons and would decide on the method of going ahead with the purchase of Apaches soon when adopted.   
					
					 The puppet military was reported to have started examining the proposal for introducing 36 U.S.-made second-hand Apaches and worked out a plan to hold a working consultation with the U.S. over this in the future. 
					
					 Such a military move timed to coincide with the action taken by the U.S. to bring back a squadron of Apaches of U.S. troops to the mainland from south Korea till coming March indicates that the war hysteria of the puppet bellicose forces going against the trend of the times towards the removal of the danger of war has reached a very serious phase.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Bid to Revive Dictatorship under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Bid to Revive Dictatorship under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration for Forcing the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 16 denouncing the Lee group of traitors' move to revive dictatorship. 
					 The statement accused the security authorities of contemplating pushing forward the so-called "bill on questioning suspicious persons by policemen on duty" these days. In case the said bill is railroaded through the "National Assembly" the security authorities will exercise unlimited power and whip up a whirlwind of fascism, it warned. 
					
					 The statement held that the Lee regime hell-bent on gagging the people is more ferocious group of fascists than any dictatorial regimes in the past.
					
					 The people's rights and democracy cannot but be violated under such a dictatorial regime, the statement said, urging the security authorities to immediately halt the moves to revive dictatorship and trample down upon  democracy and the Lee regime to step down without delay.

articles.title: Seminars on DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Held
articles.content:
Seminars on DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Held
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the joint New Year editorial published by newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league in the DPRK were held by the Ukrainian National Coordinating Committee of the Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea on Jan. 12 and 13.
					 Gennadi Berdishev, honorary chairman of the Ukrainian National Coordinating Committee of the Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that in the joint editorial the DPRK set it as the general orientation of struggle for this year to make a leap forward on all fronts through a great revolutionary surge, reviewing last year's achievements and advancing the tasks to be carried out this year.
					
					 The Korean people will surely attain the high goals for building a great prosperous and powerful nation while overcoming all hardships through a new great revolutionary surge that inherited the grand Chollima advance and thus open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, he stressed.
					
					 M. Gamrul Huda, secretary general of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, and other speakers expressed full sympathy with the joint editorial, saying that it correctly reflects the requirement of the present era.
					
					 They held that the world peace-loving people should closely unite themselves and stand by the side of the Korean people against the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Solidarity with Struggle of Korean People Called for in Egypt
articles.content:
Solidarity with Struggle of Korean People Called for in Egypt
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the National Progressive Unionist Party of Egypt released a statement on Jan. 12 in support of the DPRK's joint New Year editorial, in which he called upon all the progressive forces in the world to lift up voices of solidarity with the Korean people to help them realize their desire for reunification as early as possible.
					Saying that the joint editorial published on the occasion of the New Year, 2009 serves as a banner of struggle as it clearly indicates the tasks to be carried out by the Korean people this year, the statement expressed the belief that they would work new miracles this year in the spirit of Chollima that startled the world under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It extended solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the reunification of the country independently and peacefully by their concerted efforts under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement expressed hope that the Korean people would register greater successes in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the reunification of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported in India
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported in India
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of India (Marxist) will always extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the independent reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself" free from foreign interference, said Prakash Karat, general secretary of the Party Central Committee, when meeting the DPRK ambassador to India who paid a courtesy call on him on Jan. 15.
					He congratulated the Korean people on the great victories won by them in all fields of socialist construction despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and hoped that they would achieve greater successes in the efforts for building an economic power under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
